features: A cream-to-foam cleanser to gently exfoliate for improved skin radiance.
This plant-based vegan cleanser offers gentle yet effective exfoliation to improve your skin's texture and tone.
Good for all skin types. Targets dull, rough texture.
Featuring all natural powerful extract, enhances all skin types.
Acure products are free from parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, petrolatum, and formaldehyde.
body.description: OUR STORY: We are skin & hair wellness enthusiasts who believe in the power of purity to uplift the way you feel. We want to see every action you take lead to a stronger, healthier, more vibrant you that is ready to kick ass and take names. INGREDIENTS: We source the highest quality ingredients for your skin. No parabens, sulfates, formaldehyde, paraffin, mineral oil or animal testing allowed! SUPER POSITIVE EFFECT: Our products always uplift, for skin & hair that performs at its absolute best and a planet that flourishes. THOUGHTFUL INGENUITY: We mix together the perfect combination of super nutrients for powerful products. SHEER PASSION: We are on a mission to steer people toward better for you and accessible skin care & hair care that will allow them to shine their brightest. OUR MISSION is to take skin & hair from blah to brilliant by boosting their performance with powerful combination of amazing ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new skincare !!!
reviews.reviewText: Love love LOVE! I seen a huge difference after the first use ! Makes my skin feel so refreshed & moisturizer works all day & night ! Definitely worth the price. Will be my new skincare. Could use a little more scent but, it doesn’t necessarily stink. Overall, I’m happy with it & will buy more.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent and the texture , the ingredients are natural and very effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A repeat buy for me!
reviews.reviewText: I **LOVE** this cleanser. I have sensitive mixed dry/oily, post-menopausal face skin. I've tried other Acure skin care products (Brightening, Ultra Hydrating lines) & this by far is my favorite cleanser in quite some time. It's not drying & I think it's helped smooth the appearance of my facial skin. I hate overly perfumed products, this is lightly scented enough for me, it makes a nice foamy lather & it rinses off easily. I haven't had any irritation with it either. This is a staple for me, I think I'm on me second tube & will definitely buy this again. And I appreciate how accessible this is given that I can easily get it at either Whole Foods or Amazon. The one downside is the plastic tube, I don't think it's compostable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cleanser, kinda weird texture
reviews.reviewText: I love the concept of this clay cleanser. It's really gentle, not drying, it seems to keep my skin nice and clear. The only odd thing is the texture. It's kinda lumpy. Why can't it be smooth like a regular clay mask?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gleaming smooth skin!
reviews.reviewText: A slightly drying cleanser BUT will eat away all the glued dried dead skin cells and leave skin so smooth. I rinse & while skin is wet I add pure organic argan oil on my face and pat into skin. My skin is better at 57 than at 17 and that’s no joke. I’m aging well.. I’m ok w some wrinkles as long as I’m “dewey” and healthy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash! It makes my skin so soft and clean feeling. Smells great too!
